sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>UI Action</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var priorASMT = Class.create();
priorASMT.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    fetchIdeaAssessment: function() {
		var recSys = '0c56b8fe47783510020ba9f8536d4396'; 
        var dmnTask = recSys; //Demand Task sys id
        var demand = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand_task'); // gliding to demand table
        demand.addQuery('sys_id', dmnTask); //Found the demand Record
        demand.query();
        if (demand.next()) {

            var survey_response = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
            survey_response.addQuery('trigger_id', demand.parent);
            survey_response.addQuery('metric_type.display_value', 'Demand Assessment');
            survey_response.orderByDesc('taken_on');
            survey_response.query();

            if (survey_response.next()) {

                priorASMT = survey_response.sys_id;

            }
            print(priorASMT)
			


        }

    },

    type: 'priorASMT'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-27 05:38:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ed7e8e5547a5fd50020ba9f8536d43b8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UI Action</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ed7e8e5547a5fd50020ba9f8536d43b8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-27 05:40:08</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
